name: Panasonic Zinc Carbon Battery AAA-2, 1.5V
description: Panasonic Zinc Carbon batteries are equipped with Anti-Leak protection. This protects devices from damage due to battery rupture and leakage.0% 0% Mercury, Lead and Cadmium added. Ideal for remote controls for television, clocks, smoke detectors and torches. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
